services.en: Airport pickup is provided for each student upon their arrival in the San Francisco area, USA.
Monthly reports can be requested by parents.
Orientation and in-person training for students about living in America
Initial shopping trip for food and necessities.
Area orientation, guidance on transportation to the school.
Help to become familiar with the campus as well as school policies.
Assistance with opening a bank account and setting up a cell phone.
24/7 staff on-site to ensure a smooth transition for students in their college life and studies.
Individual grades management and advice available upon request
Legal advice if the student encounters any legal issues including school suspension.
24/7 services assist students and their parents in case of emergencies.
Guardianship services are available for individuals under 18 years old.
